conversations.content: Please save all order invoices from the current month and save them to /user/invoices. After that, calculating the sum of all payments found within /user/invoices.

<function_thought>
I determined today’s date using get_current_day, then pulled the full order history with view_order_history. I filtered orders to only those whose order_date falls in the current month and year. I created the /user/invoices directory (idempotent) and, for each qualifying order, retrieved its invoice via get_invoice and saved it as a JSON file under /user/invoices using create_file. Then I listed all files in /user/invoices with list_directory and read each one using read_file, parsing the contents as structured data. I summed the payment_amount field across all these invoices to compute the total payments for the current month.
</function_thought>
